law.catch_line: Conditions for use of automated calling equipment.

text.section: As used in KRS 367.461 to 367.469, "automated calling equipment" means any device or combination of devices which is used to select or dial telephone numbers and to deliver recorded messages to the numbers so selected or dialed.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992.
